PROMO.MAIN_TEXT: FXCH delivers a turnkey clearinghouse solution for institutions trading in digital assets with direct market access. We're all about mastering multi-counterparty risks and streamlining daily settlements with precision and ease.

TEXT.TEXT_1: FXCH equips trading firms with real-time netting across all our partner venues. Enjoy real-time trading through direct market access to designated sub-accounts and trade with the freedom of deferred settlements. Every trade is ingested instantly, keeping positions and margins updated on the fly.
TEXT.TEXT_2: Members as well as participating exchanges must pledge fiat or cryptocurrency collateral with the Clearing House before trading. These funds, held as "security interest", remain in the user's wallet at all times
TEXT.TEXT_3: FXCH continuously monitors risk across all accounts by revaluing open positions and collateral with several reliable price sources.

TECHNOLOGY.START_TEXT: Trading digital assets is inherently complex. Currently, digital asset transactions can be chaotic, with disparate systems and multiple counterparties creating a tangled web that complicates settlements and increases risk.
TECHNOLOGY.END_TEXT: FXCH streamlines clearing by consolidating it into a single platform, simplifying interactions and enhancing market access. Our integrated model securely manages risks in digital asset trading, ensuring efficient and accurate daily settlements for institutional traders, thereby boosting their confidence.

HORIZONTAL_TEXT: The FXCH Way: Elevating Your Trading Process

BENEFITS.TEXT_1: FXCH secures trading by requiring collateral pledges from all participants before market activities begin. This is used as the members margin to cover their own risk to FXCH's network
BENEFITS.TEXT_2: Members are margined in NET. We act as the counterparty for all trades, allowing for instant netting and significant increase in capital efficiency
BENEFITS.TEXT_3: All trades are settled in NET at 5pm New York every business day

POST_1.TITLE: Self-insurance risk and the demise of FXCM
POST_1.TEXT: Many pundits will offer their views on the reasons of FXCM's unfortunate fate. Focus will incorrectly point to market abuse, misleading customers and despicable FX desk practices.

POST_2.TITLE: Would you like to know what we do?
POST_2.TEXT: Get to know FXCH in 120 seconds.

POST_3.TITLE: Invest in FXCH on Seedrs and take advantage of SEIS tax relief!
